definitions: cause to lose fitness or muscle tone, especially through lack of exercise

examples.text: sedentary lifestyles that decondition their bodies

shortDefinitions: cause to lose fitness or muscle tone

definitions: reform or reverse (previously conditioned behavior), especially in the treatment of phobia and other anxiety disorders in which the fear response to certain stimuli is brought under control.
shortDefinitions: reform or reverse previously conditioned behaviour

definitions: persuade (someone) to abandon a habitual mode of thinking.
shortDefinitions: persuade someone to abandon habitual mode of thinking
